pageProduct.name: Nutra-Life L-Lysine 1200mg 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This formula provides the essential amino acid Lysine which is needed to form many of the body's proteins, including collagen in the skin. Lysine can help reduce the occurrence of facial cold sores. Taken when required, Nutra-Life® Lysine 1200 helps to support collagen formation and reduce the occurrence of facial cold sores.

Suitable For: Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Lifestyle Claim: Vegetarian

Size: 60 tablets

KEY FEATURES

• Cold Sore Formula
• Helps reduce the occurrence of facial cold sores

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Ingredients

Each tablet provides: Lysine hydrochloride 1.2g, Tabletting
aids, Colour.

Contains: Contains: Soya bean products.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Flavours| Artificial Preservatives| Dairy| Egg| Gluten| Wheat

Directions

RECOMMENDED ADULT DOSAGE: Take 1 tablet daily, or as directed by your health professional. To help reduce the occurrence of cold sores take 4 tablets daily.

USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

RECOMMENDED ADULT DOSAGE: Take 1 tablet daily, or as directed by your health professional. To help reduce the occurrence of cold sores take 4 tablets daily.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool dry place below 30°C.
